mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_email, user_password, user_nikename, user_time) values (#{id},#{email},AES_ENCRYPT(#{pwd},'hupu'),#{nikeName},#{createTime})
mapper.update: update user set user_nikename=#{newName} where user_id = #{id};
update user set user_password = AES_ENCRYPT(#{newPwd},'hupu') where user_id = #{id};
update user set user_status = #{status} where user_id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from user where user_nikename like concat('%',#{name},'%')
select AES_DECRYPT(user_password,"hupu") from user where user_id = #{id};
